paper_implementations.name: MotionCtrl: A Unified and Flexible Motion Controller for Video Generation
paper_implementations.description: Implementation of the Stable Video Diffusion variant of MotionCtrl, and experiments at smaller scale with training on camera trajectory datasets.

paper_implementations.name: AnimateDiff
paper_implementations.description: Implementation of the SDXL, ControlNet, Image-to-Video and Video-to-Video tasks. Part of official Diffusers support.

paper_implementations.name: Differential Diffusion: Giving Each Pixel Its Strength
DragNUWA: Fine-grained Control in Video Generation by Integrating Text, Image, and Trajectory
ResAdapter: Domain Consistent Resolution Adapter for Diffusion Models
Attention Is All You Need
paper_implementations.description: Implementation of the seminal paper in PyTorch from scratch, as faithfully as possible, live-streamed on YouTube.

paper_implementations.name: FreeInit: Bridging Initialization Gap in Video Diffusion Models
paper_implementations.description: Implementation generically applicable to a variety of video diffusion models. Part of official Diffusers support for AnimateDiff.

paper_implementations.name: Style Aligned Image Generation via Shared Attention
paper_implementations.description: Implementation of the attention processor to be usable in any model. Part of community Diffusers support.

paper_implementations.name: RAVE: Randomized Noise Shuffling for Fast and Consistent Video Editing with Diffusion Models
